description.en:
ENG GTranslated:
I did XXX with the witch in the housing complex. The special skill of Haruta, the son of a locksmith who lives in the housing complex, is picking. He meets a witch in a room in a housing complex where he went to work as a locksmith on behalf of his absent father. A witch (for some reason, a maid outfit) who forcibly involves Haruta in exterminating a strange mystery, Danmatsuma, who eats in the housing complex. The true power of the witch is released when Haruta opens the secret keyhole hidden under the skirt. Haruta, a boy who was first seen as a locksmith (partner) exclusively for witches, and the witch of an unmanned Muchimuchi sister, a housing complex-based one-shota erotic comedy developed by the two.

JP: [spoiler]ぼくは魔女と団地で×××した。
団地で暮らす鍵屋の息子・はる太の特技はピッキング。不在の父親にかわり、鍵屋の仕事をしに行った団地の一室で魔女と出会う。団地に巣食う異形の怪異・断末間（だんまつま）の退治に無理矢理はる太を巻き込んでいく魔女（なぜかメイド服）。そのスカートの下に隠された秘密の鍵穴をはる太が開ける時、魔女の真の力は解放される。魔女専用の鍵屋（パートナー）として見初められた少年・はる太と傍若無人なムチムチおねーさんの魔女、ふたりが繰り広げる団地系オネショタエロコメディ。[/spoiler]
